reviews.review: Even funnier than Portal 1.

This is without doubt the most innovative game by Valve. The mix of First-Person Shooter with Puzzle, a touch of humor and profound plot really hits the point. The second game managed to deepen that idea with perfection. Recommended to those who want a brand new gaming experience.
Totally awesome game. I didn't expect it to be this good, because I wasn't a big fan of the first game. If you're expecting it to be like the first game, you're wrong. It's much, much, much better.
So good I can't put it in to words... 10/10

This game has a gun. A PORTAL GUN.

It shoots portals. You know: basically a portable doorway.

If you don't get that, then get this: It's a portal gun. It shoots portals.

You know: basically a portal gun. 



What's not to love?!

Un univers génial : des décors et des musiques somptueuses au service d'un scénario captivant ! On re-découvre même sa façon de résoudre des problèmes... A jouer sans attendre (enfin, seulement après avoir fini Portal 1 pour assurer la continuité de l'histoire ^^) !
One of the best games ever... crack doesn't even begin to describe it.

Le seul FPS où avec ton arme tu ne tues pas :)
Le top des jeux !

Honestly, was interested in Portal 1. I thought no Valve game could get better. Portal 2 came out, and I stood corrected.

Pros:
+ Even better graphics
+ Even better story
+ Even better mechanics
+ Multiplayer AND Singleplayer
+ MORE INTERESTING CUSTOM MAPS
+ Funny

Cons:
- I wish I could think of some cons.
juego raramente y portalmente genial

You can run very fast, bounce very high, jump through walls, break the laws of physics, play as a robot, kill your best friend with a laser and do all of this whilst having a rogue AI insult you...
Oh yeah and Stephen Merchant's in it.
Awesome.

Dopo il primo capitolo di questa fantastica serie basata sulla risoluzione di puzzle-test, ecco che Valve ritorna con Portal 2. Single player stupendo e coop molto divertente da giocare con gli amici anche in split-screen! E in piu' non poteva mancare un editor di livelli, ancora un po' privo di contenuti, sperando che si espanda sempre di piu'
P0RTAL 2 es el mejor juego de la historia y con el nuevo: "Perpetual Testing Iniciative" nadie lo podra superar un siglos a menos que saquen el 3

傳承了前作的遊戲方式，更豐富的劇情與地圖。以及免費的DLC。
全破了?你也可以試試社群玩家們所製作的地圖或自己發揮發揮!
CUPCAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAKS!
yes
You gotta love this game for its storyline but man the Co-op play  is so easy a "Cave" Man can do it.
The sequel to one of the greatest puzzle games ever, includes English accents. 9/10.

The sequal to one of the best games of a decade!  Its a no-brainer... BUY THIS GAME!  Its friggin' sweet!

And now they came out with the "Steam Workshop" for this... so reply value just went from "okay" to "fantastic."

Amazing game. Great concept, good storyline, it's exceptionally made. The only problem I have with it is that the test chambers were arguably easier than the original Portal's, but that isn't really even an issue.

9/10, first thing you should buy if you have 20 bucks on Steam.
Portal 2 is too awesome, not for the weak and weary. Probably one of the most entertaining games ever designed if you ever get tired of first-person shooters.

A really strong follow up to the amazing original game. Portal 2 combines puzzle solving with great physics and hilarious story. It's a must play. I'd recommend you play the original Portal game first though, it's worth it.

Portal 2, the sequel to Portal, is one of the best games Valve has every made. The game enhances the original Portal by including a deeper story, a funnier script and lots of customization. The inclusion of multiplayer cooperative game-play was genius by Valve and the introduction of the map builder is what is keeping this game alive. 10/10

Потрясающая игра от Valve. Ничто так не завораживает, как мир Portal. Прошел всю историю на одном дыхании, выполняя разнообразные достижения. Волшебные герои и "классический" саундтрек ставят атмосферу на первый план. Полный "винегрет" головоломок собранных в плавный сюжет делает Portal  самой культовой игрой среди игр в жанре Головоломка / Экшн.

10/10 от FriendFrend.
A well made sequel with some great twists
A masterpiece !
CLASS GAME!!!!!
Such a Funny game ;D

[h2][b]Score: 9.5/10[/b][/h2]

Portal was a phenomenon and redefined how puzzle games are made. The narrative was original and also helped create one of the best video game songs ever created ("Still Alive" by John Coulton). Portal 2 helps build upon this in so many ways and really helps show how a sequel should be done. Instead of just being stuck in lab testing rooms through the whole game there are more environments to enjoy and the narrative takes leaps forward instead of just GLaDOS's voice droning on through speakers.

You play as the voiceless Chell once again, but you awaken after being in a coma for some time. A mysterious robot named Wheatley helps you escape your room and you finally get to see what Aperture Laboratories is like outside the testing rooms. You get to see glimpses of the outside world, vegetation has taken over the facility, and the puzzles now take form in so many different ways. Half way through the game you get to see what Aperture was like 50 some odd years ago and find out back stories on yourself, GLaDOS, and the founder of Aperture. The narrative is top notch with lots of cinematic moments, but everything involves puzzle solving and it's so mind bending that each one of the 50+ puzzles feels satisfying. It also goes to show how clever Valve is that I didn't need a walkthrough once to figure out any of the puzzles. There's so many "AHA!" moments that you just don't want to put the game down.

However, there aren't just portals involved, but other game play elements have been fused into the mix. There are three types of gels that you can use to solve puzzles such as propulsion gel (orange stuff that makes you go really fast), fusion gel (blue stuff that makes things bounce), and conversion gel (it allows portals to be made on non-portal surfaces). Due to these new elements you have to totally rethink how you work with portals and it's a great new mechanic and super fun to use. There are a few other things such as jump pads, new types of companion cubes, turrets, and other items to solve puzzles, but explaining is almost impossible because you should just play it.

The puzzles are just so uniquely fused with the narrative that you never feel like your just jumping from room to room anymore. This really feels like a puzzle/adventure this time around and some of the puzzles span two to three rooms even. There's constant chatter from characters while solving puzzles so it doesn't feel as stale this time around. All the new characters are great and you'll like them (or hate them) quickly thanks to Valve's one-of-a-kind storytelling abilities. The music is one thing I love about this game because when you start bouncing around a room or sliding there's unique music that instantly plays when you're doing these things. You get a strong sense of vertigo thanks to the game's new take on heights, but the music is just phenomenal. This soundtrack is purchase worthy and the new GLaDOS song at the end is just as good as "Still Alive" but in other ways.

The visual quality is great, but Valve really needs a new next generation engine. Portal 2 uses the Left 4 Dead 2 Source engine, so everything looks nice and there's some great visual effects (the gel mainly) as well as great lighting, but it's not exactly up to par. Thankfully there's a huge variety of things to look at this time around (the game is over 10GB!) and the addition of a co-op campaign with an additional story and two new characters is a huge plus so it's like two games in one. There's also some quality extras such as developer commentary and you can customize your robots in the co-op campaign which is a nice touch.

Portal 2 is truly something unique for this generation and probably the most innovative puzzle game ever made. With a strong narrative, lovable characters, and tons of new game play mechanics its like the first game didn't even exist. Don't be overwhelmed by working with portals because this game takes your hand for awhile and slowly lets you go when you feel confident enough you'll know. Valve knows how to make great games and other developers need to follow suit.
워낙에 유명한 게임이라 달리 설명할 필요가 있을까 싶다. [벨브]가 만드는 게임의 특징을 가장 잘 보여주는 작품. 어찌 보면 [하프라이프] 시리즈 보다, 이젠 이 게임이 더 [벨브]답지 않을까?

Simplemente espectacular. Los puzles, aunque algo facilones si se les compara con los de Portal 1, son extremadamente creativos, bien diseñados y ambientados muy bien. La trama creció muchísimo, pues cuenta con personajes realmente interesantes como GLaDOS, Wheatley y Cave Johnson, cuyas actuaciones de voz, por lo menos en inglés, son excelentes.
Pese que la campaña de un jugador es muy buena, la verdadera gloria de la que se jacta Portal 2 para estar en su altar es la campaña cooperativa. Esta tiene su propia historia. Los puzles son radicalmente más difíciles, pero hay dos mentes tratando de resolverlos en conjunto. Las herramientas de comunicación son excelentes, permitiendo que resolver los puzles en cooperación resulte como si tuvieras a tu amigo al lado.
100% recomendado; este juego puede entregar una experiencia inolvidable a quien lo juegue.
Sabiendo que la primera parte de este juego ya tuvo un gran éxito, no es de extrañar que el Portal 2 sea aun mejor.
Makes you question your IQ

Pure genious. Brilliant writing and amazing voice acting the whole way through makes this one of the most enjoyable games I have ever played. Fully exceeding my expectations and more with the main story and the Co-op. Portal 2 now includes a level editor and a decent community who continues to push our minds to the limit for many hours after you finish the main story. Not only that, but with the inclusion of importing custom chambers from the Hammer Editor (which can be much more detailed and include your own recorded audio) it takes the game to an entirely new level. As long as creative people keep creating test chambers I will continue to return to Aperture Science for more testing. 9.5/10
Possibly the best videogame sequel ever made
Valve has done it again. Portal 2 is fun and challenging.
The best puzzle game ever made.

Le meilleur jeu de Valve pour moi, j'adhère complètement au concept très original, et si la durée de vie venait à manquer il y a peu, désormais avec le workshop c'est un nombre quasi infini d'heure qui vous attend si vous êtes un fan des jeux de réflexions, et autant dire que les salle de test du scénario ne sont qu'une balade de santé comparé à ce que l'on trouve sur le workshop. Portal 2 was the first game I got on Steam. It is the game that stole my life and replaced it with the task of serving our lord Gaben with the funds from my wallet. It devoured my afternoons, my social life, my economic standing and it even ate my dog. I'll never repay this game enough.

Freaking Awesome !!!

Zu diesem Spiel gibt es nicht viel zu sagen:

Meine Erwartungen hat es erfüllt bzw. sogar übertreffen. Es ist ein guter Nachfolger, da in ziemlich jeden Kriterium gepunktet werden kann: Story ist jetzt nicht der Knaller, aber reicht komplett aus, da vorallem auf die Vergangenheit von Aperture Science eingegangen wird, Grafik hat sich verbessert, Sound wurde auch verbessert, Gameplay ist flüssig und alle Rätsel sind lösbar. Zwei Punkte unterscheiden sich vom Vorgänger: Der Co-Op-Modus über Internet und die Gele, die das Gameplay erweitern. Der Co-Op ist zwar klein, macht aber viel Spaß. Man hat keinen Nachteil, wenn man diesen nicht gespielt hat. Die Gele verändern die Bewegung des Spielers, welches wiederum in Rätsel eingebaut wurde. Ein weiterer Pluspunkt wäre die Verbindung mit dem Steam Workshop, womit man von anderen Benutzern erstellte Level spielen kann.

Meiner Meinung nach ist dieses Spiel das Geld voll und ganz wert und bietet neben dem Hauptteil noch viele Möglichkeiten die Zeit zu vertreiben.
Marvellous sequel!

this game is a piece of shit

Before buying this game, I heard that Portal was the definitive game and that Portal 2 wasn't as good. When Portal 2 was discounted back in December, I bought Half-Life 2 and the two episodes instead: I liked Portal, but wasn't that interested in puzzles. When Portal 2 was discounted again, I finally decided to buy it, and I can say that this game is as close to perfect as possible. This game has it all: great characters with hilarious dialogue, an engaging story with challenging and rewarding puzzles, and just a great purchase all in all. The only negatives were some strange lag and a couple absurdly-difficult puzzles. With another top-notch ending and great time-trial content, this game is good enough to get more words written about it than Team Fortress 2, and it is definitely better than the original Portal. Since I'm still not that enamored with puzzles, I personally cannot give it a perfect score. Despite that, 9.75/10. Buy it for all time, kiddies.
such a great game! I can't understand why u don't have it yet?

Marvelous, this is a jewel of a game. Not only is it fun to play, it is meaningful. Minus a few frustrating points, that are compensated nicely by your pride at completeing them, it is very entertaining. Every single line of dialouge is very thought out, and every character has more depth than you can imagine. The storyline is full and satisfying, and the ending is emotional. The co-op is fun, and playing portal puzzles with your friend is GREAT! A++
53% MORE PORTALS, 100% LESS CAKE,  AND 200% MORE AWESOME!!!!!!

Se o 1º Portal já era bom... e o 2 só melhorou... quem gostou do 1º vai gostar do 2º! Se não tiver o 1º é melhor comprar o pacote porque a história é uma sequência, e o 1º continua valendo a pena. O 2º além de mais produzido, cenários e tal, também tem muitas outras formas de interação, muita coisa nova, deixando o jogo bem variado. A história principal tem só cerca de 10h, mas dá pra baixar infinitos extras feitos por outras pessoas. Recomendo!

An epic sequel to the fantastic Portal. A definite must have if you ever played Portal.
Back in the laboratories of Aperature Science and again with the Aperature Science Portal Gun making your way through the complex by your use of Portals and any other tools provided!
Handy hints: Companion cube is your best and only friend. Give the turrets no mercy. Also the cake is a lie.

The best damn game I have played in years, an absolute masterpiece. Perfectly paced, perfectly executed, just superb. If you like puzzle games, or any game that makes you think, then you should play this, no exceptions.
One of the best games from Valve. It has everything: mind stimulation, fun, cool storyline, good graphics. It's unique, a real masterpiece :)
